relnotes.name: IPSec

revision.description: The PF_KEY interface (supported constants) is extended to include all supported IPSec.prt encryption and authentication algorithms.

Adding new KSoIp6InterfaceUnicastHops flow option so interface TTL can be retrieved excluding the effect of any socket options. If no interface has been selected for the flow, the TCP/IP 6 stack default value will be returned. This value is used to set the correct TTL for the outer packet header in ipsec ipip_eng6.cpp.

relnotes.purpose: IPSec key negotiation for IPv4/v6. Depends on security components.
